column1: The terms below were recorded on April 01, 2018 at Mwiba Lodge
Informants: Nairuko, Ole Pau Kirando & Ole Peria Mbogo
Recorders: Daudi Peterson - Dorobo Safaris, Dorobo Fund, UCRT; Paulo Parana - Dorobo from Makao; Alina - Lodge Manager Mwiba
Nairuko who recalls the most, is by accounts  over 100 years old,  is  frail and has suffered significant loss of hearing since 2014.
Systematic enquiry by the recorders was limited in success with many terms the result of spontaneous recall as we met & discussed.
Some of Paulo's spellings may  be due to lack of experience with writing.
2014 informants: the same three individuals. Recorders: Daudi, Dismas Meitaya- UCRT & Bunga - UCRT
2012 informants: the same two elderly men. Recorder: Daudi
Thank you to Mwiba for facilitating this exercise.

column6: 2012 neng'a pl. sesa s. be quiet
2014 - ngakeet - they say it is four
2014 - wa'itamu; waitamu; waetamu - did not catch
2012 - hanokining - lit. where are you from?
